This blog is built with blogdown and Hugo, and deployed using Netlify. My blog posts are released under a Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike 4.0 International License. My avatar illustration is by Emily Griffin.

Posts are written in [R Markdown](https://rmarkdown.rstudio.com/) and the website is built upon the [Distill R Markdown Framework](https://rstudio.github.io/distill/)(based on the web framework developed by the [Distill Machine Learning Journal](https://distill.pub/)).

My blog posts are released under a [Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike 4.0 International License](https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/4.0/).
